alert.note: Alert for Hartford (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A stronger line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of north central Hartford, southeastern Hampshire and Hampden Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a stronger line of showers that are capable or producing wind gusts in excess of 40 mph along a line extending from near South Hadley to near Granville. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Windsor, Northampton, Agawam, West Springfield, Simsbury, Ludlow, Bloomfield, South Hadley, Easthampton, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Belchertown and Wilbraham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
